title: Hina wa Mitsu-iro no Koi ni Torawareru
original_name: ひなは蜜色の恋にとらわれる
sinopse: After finding out that his best friend who he was in love with since college is getting married, Shinobu goes to a bar in his despair, and spends the night with a man named Kou. Regretting it the next morning, Shinobu runs away, but then meets Kou again at work!
